parameters.name: FileName
parameters.description: Path to image file including file extension

parameters.name: HighestResolution
parameters.description: True to insert images up to 8192 pixels without compression, false to compress images to 2048 pixels before insertion (see Remarks )

title: ISketchManager.InsertSketchPicture2
description: Inserts a picture on the current drawing sketch.
signature:
SketchPicture InsertSketchPicture2( 
   System.String
FileName
,
   System.Boolean
HighestResolution
)

parameters.name: FileName
parameters.description: Path to image file including file extension

parameters.name: HighestResolution
parameters.description: True to insert images up to 8192 pixels without compression, false to compress images to 2048 pixels before insertion (see Remarks )

remarks: If the document type is not a drawing, then HighestResolution defaults to false.
